# PHYSICS::SET_USE_KINEMATIC_PHYSICS

## Summary
Prevent an entity from being pushed

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entityId: Id of prop entity.
* **BOOL** useKinematic: If true, the given entity will be treated as having infinite mass when in collisions

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
PED_RAGDOLL_BUMP Proof?
